meanings.definition: Having or marked by veins or vein-like markings.
meanings.sent1: The venulose leaf had thin lines running through it.
meanings.sent2: The rock had a venulose pattern on its surface.
meanings.sent3: The venulose tree looked like a map of roads from above.
meanings.sent4: Her skin was as venulose as a detailed map.
meanings.sent5: The venulose design on the fabric was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The venulose wings of the butterfly were delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The venulose petals of the flower added texture to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The venulose pattern on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were venulose with tiny blood vessels.
meanings.sent5: The venulose marble statue looked almost lifelike.
